remarks: Membership in a shifted interval.  (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.)
statement:
iccshftri.1 $e |- A e. RR $.
iccshftri.2 $e |- B e. RR $.
iccshftri.3 $e |- R e. RR $.
iccshftri.4 $e |- ( A + R ) = C $.
iccshftri.5 $e |- ( B + R ) = D $.
iccshftri $p |- ( X e. ( A [,] B ) -> ( X + R ) e. ( C [,] D ) ) $.
